name: Trick
text:
Trick
"I almost got killed coming over here! Some fucking ass-eater ran me off the highway, all I see is two headlights coming fucking right at me! I ran off the road and almost hit a tree, some farmer had to pull me out!"
Trick was a resident of Twin Peaks, Washington.
Biography
Trick was under house arrest. After his release, he was run off the road one night by an oncoming car, sending him into a ditch. A farmer had to help pull his car back onto the road. He joined Abbie and Natalie at the Roadhouse minutes later, telling them excitedly what had happened before leaving to get them another round.
